forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 53. West southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 4am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 47, with temperatures rising to around 49 overnight. South southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a cloak of muted clouds, mirroring the cool and crisp predictions that form the backdrop for the day ahead. As the sun rises toward a high of 53, the air feels somewhat invigorating, carried by gentle breezes that whisper through the streets. Glancing toward the Golden Gate, you'll notice the distant contours of the bridge obscured by a thin veil of marine fog, maintaining a sense of mystery as if the city holds its breath in anticipation of the day unfolding.

As daylight breaks, expect the clouds to persist, perhaps thickening with the promise of rain creeping in later this evening. With the mercury destined to dip towards the mid-forties tonight, comfort becomes key. Layering will serve you well; a warm sweater beneath a light jacket, perhaps, coupled with comfortable shoes should you be wandering through the streets. It may be the sort of day inviting a gentle stroll along the waterfront, the fresh air mingling with the scent of the sea, or perhaps just a chance to curl up in a cozy café, a book in hand, as the world outside readies itself for a touch of rain. A quiet exploration of the local art scene might also be in order, as the perfect antidote to the grey skies overhead.
